languages.text: "Твоего обаяния не хватит даже на мой мизинец, торговка. Просто ты слишком мелкая преступница, чтобы арбитр тратил на тебя время".
"Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
languages.original_text: "Твоего обаяния не хватит даже на мой мизинец, торговка. Просто ты слишком мелкая преступница, чтобы арбитр тратил на тебя время".

traits.locale_text: "You have all the charm of one of Glaito's turds. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
"You have all the charm of one of Glaito's turds. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
"You have all the charm of one of Glaito's turds. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
"Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
"Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

languages.text: 「他の誰かを口説くんだな。アービトレイターの時間は貴重だ。くだらない犯罪者に浪費されるものではない」
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

traits.locale_text: 「他の誰かを口説くんだな。アービトレイターの時間は貴重だ。くだらない犯罪者に浪費されるものではない」

languages.text: "Schmeichelt jemand anderem. Die Zeit eines Arbitrators ist wertvoll und darf nicht auf Kleinkriminelle vergeudet werden."
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

traits.locale_text: "Schmeichelt jemand anderem. Die Zeit eines Arbitrators ist wertvoll und darf nicht auf Kleinkriminelle vergeudet werden."

languages.text: « Gardez votre charme pour quelqu'un d'autre. Un arbitrator n'a pas de temps à perdre avec les criminels à la petite semaine. »
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

traits.locale_text: « Gardez votre charme pour quelqu'un d'autre. Un arbitrator n'a pas de temps à perdre avec les criminels à la petite semaine. »

languages.text: «A otro perro con ese hueso. El tiempo de un Arbitrator es demasiado valioso para malgastarlo con criminales vulgares».
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

traits.locale_text: «A otro perro con ese hueso. El tiempo de un Arbitrator es demasiado valioso para malgastarlo con criminales vulgares».

languages.text: “还是把你的魅力用在别人身上吧。法务官的时间非常宝贵，不能浪费在不入流的罪犯身上。”
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."

traits.locale_text: “还是把你的魅力用在别人身上吧。法务官的时间非常宝贵，不能浪费在不入流的罪犯身上。”

languages.text: "Git, cazibeni başkalarında kullan. Yargıcı olarak değerli vaktimi senin gibi adi suçlularla harcayacak değilim."
languages.original_text: "Go and charm someone else. An Arbitrator's time is valuable and not to be wasted on petty criminals."
